thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-United Bank Of India Posts Dec Qtr Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United Bank Of India Posts Dec Qtr Loss
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - United Bank Of India:
* DEC QUARTER NET LOSS 6.38 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 641 MILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 20.05 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 22.72 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS 10.74 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 5.89 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 20.10 PERCENT VERSUS 18.80 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 11.96 PERCENT VERSUS 11.63 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2G7vopA Further company coverage:
